methods.isStream:
Returns true if table is a stream table.

:param table: (io.deephaven.engine.tables.Table) - the table to check for stream behavior
:return: (boolean) Whether this table is a stream table
methods.streamToAppendOnlyTable:
Convert a Stream Table to an in-memory append only table.

 Note, this table will grow without bound as new stream values are encountered.

:param streamTable: (io.deephaven.engine.tables.Table) - the input stream table
:return: (io.deephaven.engine.tables.Table) an append-only in-memory table representing all data encountered in the stream
